00014 template<class P, class I, class C, class R, class O>
00015 typename Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::producer const &Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::get
00016 (typename Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::id_param id) const {
00017     typename Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::catalog_type::const_iterator 
00018     i = m_producers.find(id);
00019     if( m_producers.end()==i )
00020         throw UnknownFactoryType("No producer associated to this ID");
00021     return *(i->second); 
00022 }

00024 template<class P, class I, class C, class R, class O>
00025 bool Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::exists
00026 (typename Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::id_param id) const {
00027     return m_producers.end()!=m_producers.find(id);
00028 }

00030 template<class P, class I, class C, class R, class O>
00031 void Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::add
00032 (typename Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::producer const *prod) {
00033     typename Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::catalog_type::value_type
00034     to_ins(prod->getId(), prod);
00035     if( !m_producers.insert(to_ins).second ) {
00036 # if 0 // I have a weird bug some time with that ... to be checked
00037         throw MultipleFactoryDecl("ID multiply used.");
00038 # endif 
00039     }
00040 }

00042 template<class P, class I, class C, class R, class O>
00043 void Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::remove
00044 (typename Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::producer const *prod) {
00045     typename Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::catalog_type::iterator
00046     i = m_producers.find(prod->getId());
00047     if( m_producers.end()!=i && i->second==prod ) 
00048         m_producers.erase(i);
00049 }

00051 template<class P, class I, class C, class R, class O>
00052 void Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::getIds(std::list<I> &ids) const {
00053     typename Factory<P, I, C, R, O>::catalog_type::const_iterator
00054     i = m_producers.begin();
00055     for( ; m_producers.end()!=i; ++i)
00056         ids.push_back(i->first);
00057 }
